name: Corrupted Code
desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, a character loses all their Energy when they Break enemy Weaknesses.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio regenerates characters' Energy
bg_desc:
There are random line breaks, no indentation, and even the names of variants and functions are incomprehensible abbreviations... It's so ugly to the point that you can't proofread it with the naked eye.
"But what if it works?"
